testcase.name: URL is leading us into the correct page
display hints for the username and password fields
testcase.system-out: Given the user nevigate to login url........................................passed When the user checks username text field....................................passed And the user checks password text field.....................................passed Then username displays hint as email........................................passed And password displays hint as password......................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given the user nevigate to url..............................................passed When the user reaches Keep me Signed in checkbox............................passed Then Validate 'keep me signed in' checbox is between password and sign button.passed
